name: rejoicingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows great happiness about something: The children ran up to their grandfather and flung their arms around him rejoicingly. After reaching the summit, the group headed back down, singing rejoicingly as they went.
More examplesFewer examplesThe preacher encouraged the congregation to rejoicingly let God's love into their hearts.The weary group of travellers was welcomed rejoicingly by the family and soon made to feel at home.The minister told them to rejoicingly accept the will of God.
